name: Gibson Aviation
about: Gibson Aviation is a full-service Fixed Base Operator (FBO) dedicated to providing comprehensive aviation services. With roots dating back to 1961 through Darrel R. Gibson's involvement in his father's FBO business, Gibson Aviation has evolved into a premier facility offering flight training, aircraft maintenance, and avionics installations. As an Authorized Garmin Dealer and a FAA-approved Limited Repair Station, we ensure the highest standards in all our services. Our flight training programs are available at both Menomonie Municipal Airport and Chippewa Valley Regional Airport, catering to a wide range of aviation needs. Our friendly and helpful staff, modern terminal, and competitive fuel prices make us an excellent choice for pilots and aviation enthusiasts. We are committed to delivering exceptional service and support to our clients.
services:
